name: Daft Funk
description:
Daft Punk tribute act Daft Funk Live will perform at VULKAN ARENA , OSLO, on 21 March. 
Their work is never over.

‘Daft Funk Live’ are one of the world's most prestigious Daft Punk tribute bands -
diligently constructing a LIVE accolade of Daft Punk’s legendary performances and appearances. They incorporate their own synchronised light shows together with live instruments to give a truly immersive and unique experience. Their stage production is meticulously crafted, paying the utmost respect to the infamous and illusive Robots.

In light of the recent split of the official robots, these equally mysterious robots continue to pay homage to the infamous house masters by performing Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger. Expect live renditions of selected songs from Homework to RAM....and beyond with the addition of unique mixes in the revered Daft Punk style.


Get your tickets for the Daft Funk Live from Ticketmaster.no

For more information on the band please visit: www.daftfunk.co.uk
